name: Seeker of the Dusk (ESP)
description:
How to play:

GamePad (dualshock / xbox) HIGHLY recommended.

Use joystick or d-pad to move. Square to attack. X to jump. Triangle to use potion. Press start to open the menu.

---------------------------------------------------------------

Final project for HND. Credit to AlexRoe for the music. Game features texts in Spanish, please refer to "how to play" for more information.

This game features motion capture animations done by me.
